tidge
Don't confuse this with the retail version of the same-named sword. Obviously the game includes many potential ways for figures to heal, but for ME to invest potential points in a POTENTIAL way to temporarily counteract a POTENTIAL strategy that is already going to be difficult to pull off (for ME, since I have to make sure I'm hitting a particular piece with BCF)... I've got to say there I see pretty much every other Sword Object as a better choice... and if we are talking all equipment I'd have to pay 10 points to use, this is definitely near the bottom of the list. Even so: There is a Sword Bearer who I think can use this Sword as a sort of "jerk move": The retail version (034) of Death can use this sword to make the extra click of unavoidable damage "stick".
